title: fix: Node 22/23 compatibility for text and image services
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Node 23 Ready
gist.blurb: Updated our text and image services to play nicely with Node 22 and 23. Keeping the backend fresh and buzzing.
gist.summary: Updated import paths and package configurations to ensure compatibility with Node.js 22 and 23 for text and image services.
gist.impact: Developers can now run the backend services using the latest Node.js versions without import errors.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot performing maintenance on a server rack that has a hexagonal (Node.js) motif.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny hard hat, adjusting a glowing green hexagonal server panel. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The bee mascot with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'SYSTEM UPDATE'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
